author: Xu, MH; Xu, LS
adress: Army Med Univ, Dept Neurosurg, Daping Hosp, Chongqing, Peoples R China
title: Long Non-Coding RNA Plasmacytoma Variant Translocation 1 (PVT1) Enhances Proliferation, Migration, and Epithelial-Mesenchymal Transition (EMT) of Pituitary Adenoma Cells by Activating beta-Catenin, c-Myc, and Cyclin D1 Expression
